types:type.name: note_json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type note_json = {| headline: String, owner: String, timestamp: String, content: String |} {"example": "{\\\"headline\\\":\\\"Happiness Rains on Bobtown\\\",\\\"owner\\\":\\\"Bob\\\",\\\"timestamp\\\":\\\"note-0200521\\\",\\\"content\\\":\\\"One day this will all be yours\\\"}"}

types:type.name: object_json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type object_json = {| objecttypename: String, objectproperties: {| line: String, year: String |}, objectdata: String |} {"example": "{\\\"objecttypename\\\":\\\"ship\\\",\\\"objectproperties\\\":{\\\"line\\\":\\\"Nimitz\\\",\\\"year\\\":\\\"1999\\\"},\\\"objectdata\\\":\\\"dataencodedinline\\\"}"}
